website_summaries.verdict: These hockey-style ice skates may seem a little pricey until you realize that you can expand their size at the push of a button, making it an investment that grows alongside young skaters.
pros: Easily expands upwards of 4 shoe sizes
Available in medium and large sizes
cons: Blades should be sharpened before use

customer_reviews.title: Great for recreational ice skating!
customer_reviews.text: We have an ice rink near us in winter and discovered rental skates are super loose on ankles and hard for kids to enjoy. We figured out buying inexpensive skates made more sense. We only had to go a few times and we would have paid the same amount in rentals. This year I discovered these with adjustable sizing!!! Brilliant!!! Before we could only use each size a season and then pass down to younger sibling, but this will last much longer! They were easy to figure out and my kid enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R.

customer_reviews.title: OK for learning
customer_reviews.text: These are OK for a kid that's never ice skated before and is just trying it out. The are made cheap though and didnt last very long. Ended up buying a better pair of hockey skates for my son after a month of use with these.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: OK for smaller sizes
customer_reviews.text: Those skates are OK as long as you're using the smaller adjustments. On the longer ones, there's a hole through which you can see the feet (i.e. that let the cold in). Other than that, it's not a bad investment, as you'll be able to use them longer than one-size skates.
customer_reviews.author: Elle M.

customer_reviews.title: fun but feet get cold
customer_reviews.text: Our boys had lots of fun with these skates last winter. They mostly used them to skate on our frozen pond, but also on skating arena. The skates are great, but on colder days the boys complained about their feet being frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but one of the clips broke after using it 3 times. My son really liked it but since it broke, i had to ask for refund. Ofcourse, Amazon customer support was great and accepted my request for return after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: A K G

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Medium (size 2 - 5) and received a kids size 1 - 4. This product is mis-labelled. I thought I was buying a skate my boy could fit for a couple of years (as he is already a size 3). I am disappointed to say the least and would have gone with a different make.
customer_reviews.author: AKSweetie

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson for Christmas. He is into hockey so it was perfect. Fit was true to size and very wel made.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to adjust and fit comfortably
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to adjust to kids feet once on theor feet. My son did not.complain about having cold feet either. The snaps are easily adjusted for the fit. They were comfortable as well and my son skated for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Size  range smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: These seem like nice skates, but the size listed on the description is innacurate. The size range goes up to size 4, not 5 as indicated. I returned them because my 8 year old is too close to the end size to make it worth keeping the adjustable skate.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 4 year old for his hockey lessons. He says they’re so much more comfortable than the rental skates. And they’ll last him for a couple years as they’re adjustable for 3 sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Aiden’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small. Ordered the 4-7 for my son who normally wears a size 4. He needs to wear them at the size 6. Won’t last as long as I hoped. Very bunchy foot pad at the bottom too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really well made and they will hold up
customer_reviews.text: These are adjustable size 1-3. Well made and I’d highly recommend for youngsters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: The inner shoes pads always loose out. Cheap quality and don’t know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: Neat money saving idea
customer_reviews.text: Very cool idea and saves money for a couple of years. According to my kids they're very comfortable and they really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Nivia Martin

customer_reviews.title: I do not have to tie!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo puts them on by himself. The price is right and the quality ok for 8yo beginner. So far 15 hours of hockey/fun skating. Good ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: item was what I expected
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my grandson, he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Shari K. Dutcher

customer_reviews.title: This boot doesnt fit well
customer_reviews.text: my son could not even balance, he fell lots of time
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time skaters.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson used these last weekend. He said they are very comfortable-no blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for my 6 year old! Easy to use and adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Easy on & off. And durable for my 4 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits right
customer_reviews.text: Like the push button size adjustability. Construction is good (so far) blades are holding up too
customer_reviews.author: MotelDéPott

customer_reviews.title: Great skates! I love that they are adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Great skates! I love that they are adjustable! We love these. My two boys each have a set and my girl has the girls set! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: These can’t be sharpened in some machines
customer_reviews.text: These skates are great for learning to skate. However, if you want to get them sharpened, they don’t fit into the machine so they remain dull and effect skating.
customer_reviews.author: Machelle Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! My son loves them. Hes new to skating, but says these are very comfortable and keep his feet warm. Easy to adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wornek

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old son. He loves them, they fit well. The tightening system instead of laces is the best part of the product to me.
customer_reviews.author: JRS GMS

customer_reviews.title: My older kids have the similar skates (Same brand but different model without the straps) and they are great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old and the bottom strap is defective. It does not work so skate remains loose. Skates are cheaply made. My older kids have the similar skates (Same brand but different model without the straps) and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Adjustable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They are great! My son wore them for the first time today. Love how they adjust and are comfortable. No complaining about sore feet!
customer_reviews.author: ERIN SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: In 3 months the tounge on one of the skates already had a crack in the cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: top strap broke after 5-6 skates.. had to reinforce it with a bungee cable. but sheesh!!!
customer_reviews.author: richard milhouse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for growing feet!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST idea for growing boys. They should fit him next year also. I love how they are similar to a ski boot, with easy on, off, and no saggy ankles!
customer_reviews.author: sherriede

customer_reviews.title: These will last us for 2 seasons or more!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner's skates. My 7-yo son loves them, and I love that he won't outgrow them anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: ninjette

customer_reviews.title: Very good service and came in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: Very good service and came in a timely manner. The product was a to hard for my Grandson to wear because of the material(Plastic) was just to hard and hurt his legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this if you can
customer_reviews.text: tough to put on. definitely not recommended for a beginner. stay away from resizable skates. low quality construction - plastic-like, ankle pain. enough wear on first day of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Arm

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was too big and bulky so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Ismaili

customer_reviews.title: Not for figure skating.
customer_reviews.text: It says "figure skating" in the description but according to skating instructor these are not meant for figure skating.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Ban

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy at all
customer_reviews.text: These skates are junk. The inside are all bunched up and tongue does not stay right. Bought 2 pair girls and 2 pair boys and now have to pay shipping back for something that is defective. Not Happy at all. I guess this is what you get when made in CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Tetreault

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I would give 0 stars if possible. I checked off 'Black' option for color, not 'Black/orange' and I received the Black/Orange skates....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Lake Placid Boys Nitro 8.8 Adjustable Ice Skates
product_meta.description: Look cool on the ice in the Lake Placid Nitro 8.8 ice skates. EZ Push button design allows you to easily adjust the size to fit your child's growing foot.
feature_bullets: EZ Push button adjustable molded boot construction
Heat treated, nickel plated carvon steel blades
Adjustable sizing: Small fits shoe sizes 11-1, Medium fits shoe sizes 1-4 and Large fits shoe sizes 4-7
EZ Push button adjustable molded boot construction
Heat treated, nickel plated carvon steel blades
Adjustable sizing: Small fits shoe sizes 11-1, Medium fits shoe sizes 1-4 and Large fits shoe sizes 4-7

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
